milestones.title: Project Planning and Design
milestones.description: Market research and feasibility study, Site selection and acquisition, Architectural design and blueprint creation, Obtaining necessary permits and approvals
milestones.paymentDetails: : 10% of the total project cost upon completion of all tasks in this milestone.

milestones.title: Site Development and Foundation Construction
milestones.description: Site clearing and preparation, Laying the foundation and installation of underground utilities, Inspection and approval of foundation work
milestones.paymentDetails: : 15% of the total project cost upon completion of all tasks in this milestone.

milestones.title: Structural Work and Exterior Development
milestones.description: Construction of building structure, Installation of exterior walls, roofing, and windows, Exterior landscaping and parking development
milestones.paymentDetails: : 30% of the total project cost upon completion of all tasks in this milestone.

milestones.title: Interior Development and Finishing
milestones.description: Installation of interior walls, flooring, and ceilings, Plumbing, electrical, and HVAC work, Installation of security systems and premium amenities, Interior design and finishing
milestones.paymentDetails: : 30% of the total project cost upon completion of all tasks in this milestone.

milestones.title: Final Inspection and Project Closeout
milestones.description: Final inspection and obtaining Certificate of Occupancy, Marketing and Sales, Handover to buyers
milestones.paymentDetails: : 15% of the total project cost upon completion of all tasks in this milestone.
